sentences.sContent: I saw this policy of “purification” up close.
sentences.sContent_eng: I saw this policy of “purification” up close.
sentences.sCn: 我目睹的了“净化”政策的整个过程。

sentences.sContent: The country has already produced nanotechnology products for export in areas including food packaging, water purification and herbal medicine.
sentences.sContent_eng: The country has already produced nanotechnology products for export in areas including food packaging, water purification and herbal medicine.
sentences.sCn: 该国已经生产了供出口的纳米技术产品，其领域包括食品包装、水净化以及草药。

sentences.sContent: The fact that the yoga is performed in the nude is significant because in the nude status, the toxins in the body find an outlet leading to purification of body and soul.
sentences.sContent_eng: The fact that the yoga is performed in the nude is significant because in the nude status, the toxins in the body find an outlet leading to purification of body and soul.
sentences.sCn: 这种瑜伽裸体进行，这一事实非常重要，因为在裸体的状态中，身体中的“毒素”会找到一个出口而后引向肉体与灵魂的净化。

phrases.pCn: 水净化器；水净化系统；纯水系统

words.tran: [食品] 净化器；清洁者；精炼器；精炼者
使纯净；去除（purify的过去分词）；精炼
